alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Washington (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 8:02AM CDT until July 17 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN POTTAWATTAMIE...SOUTHERN WASHINGTON AND NORTHEASTERN DOUGLAS COUNTIES... At 801 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northwest of Bennington, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Public reported golf ball size hail 4 miles north of Fremont with this storm. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe storm will be near... Bennington around 805 AM CDT. Northern Omaha, Fort Calhoun and Standing Bear Lake around 810 AM CDT. Florence, Benson and Aksarben around 815 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Carter Lake, Crescent, Eppley Airfield, Midtown, Council Bluffs and Council Bluffs Airport. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
